notes: -い Adjective Negation\n(replace -i with -kunai)\nRemove です to make informal

japanese: <noun>オーストラリア</><obj>の</><noun>１２月</><obj>は</><adj>寒</><adv>くない</><verb>です</>
english: December in Australia is not cold
I'm bored! (because there is nothing to do)

japanese: <det>あの</><noun>映画</><obj>は</><adj>つまらない</><verb>です</>

english: I am free tomorrow (as for tomorrow, it's free for me)
I am not free this week / I am busy this week

japanese: <noun>公衆トイレ</><obj>は</><adj>きれい</><adv>じゃない</><verb>です</>
<noun>家</><obj>の</><noun>トイレ</><obj>は</><adj>臭</><adv>くない</><verb>です</>
english: The bathroom in my house doesn't stink
